Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class TurnController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.TurnController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TurnController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This Class contains all methods used to manage every single turn of the match.
See Also:

    • checkEffectPhase

      public boolean checkEffectPhase​(PhaseType currentPhaseType)
      Check if Active Player's Effect is applicable in current Phase.
      Parameters:
      currentPhaseType - current Phase Type
      Returns:
      true if Effect is applicable, false otherwise.

    • requireEffect

      public boolean requireEffect()
      Returns:
      true if Effect' Require is satisfied, false otherwise.

    • resumePhase

      public void resumePhase()
      Resume to previous Phase.

    • turnControllerNotify

      public void turnControllerNotify​(java.lang.String messageToNotify, java.lang.String excludeNickname)
      Sends a Match Info Message to all the players. Sends a Generic Message which contains Turn Information to all players but the one specified in the second argument.
      Parameters:
      messageToNotify - Message to send.
      excludeNickname - name of the player to be excluded from the broadcast.

    • getNicknameQueue
